abstract: Mikaela Shiffrin wins World Cup slalom in Jasna, Slovakia; other winter sports news noted.
snippet: Shiffrin won a women’s World Cup slalom by 2.36 seconds in Jasna, Slovakia, on Sunday, while Frida Hansdotter of Sweden finished 10th to wrap up the discipline title.
lead_paragraph: Shiffrin won a women’s World Cup slalom by 2.36 seconds in Jasna, Slovakia, on Sunday, while Frida Hansdotter of Sweden finished 10th to wrap up the discipline title.
